faq.a: BuyerBrief is a timeline-first buyer workspace that keeps milestones, tasks, and next steps organized from intake to closing.
RealtySaSS can include CRM capabilities, but the core philosophy is buyer execution: timeline, scripts, checklists, and clean handoffs. CRM is an add-on depending on your plan.

faq.q: Can I buy the CRM by itself?
faq.a: No. The CRM is only available as a $99/month add-on for agents on BuyerBrief Pro (monthly or annual). There is no standalone CRM purchase path.

faq.q: What’s the difference between deterministic Elena and narrated Elena?
faq.a: Deterministic Elena (elena-agent) produces a structured truth packet (math + rails + next action). Narrated Elena (ask-elena) can turn that packet into polished human-friendly guidance and scripts.

sales_pitch.bluf: RealtySaSS helps agents run deals like a system: clean buyer intake, timeline execution, strong scripts, and fewer surprises.
elevator_pitch: If you’ve ever felt like every buyer deal is a custom fire drill, RealtySaSS fixes that.
BuyerBrief gives you a repeatable timeline playbook. Elena gives you scripts and next steps. You close faster with less chaos.
